title: Support Groups
shortDescription: Peer support meetings connecting families and individuals sharing similar experiences.
description: Support groups bring together families, caregivers, and autistic individuals to share experiences, exchange information, and provide mutual emotional support. Groups may focus on parents of newly diagnosed children, siblings, autistic adults, or specific topics like transition planning or advocacy. Support groups offer a sense of community and understanding that can be invaluable for navigating the challenges and celebrating the joys of the autism journey.
